missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack a door (Health 5, Defense: 1 black die), or a hero can interact with a door ({I}) to open it.
{-} The mission will progress when the first door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
missionProperties.startingObjective: Infiltrate the facility and find General Weiss.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Weaving through the intense battle, your transport dodges TIE Fighters and turbolaser fire. The Rebel fleet opened the battle with a feint, drawing out Weiss's ambush and then springing a trap of its own.

As you descend into the atmosphere of the planet, the battle becomes a blaze of flashing lights above the clouds. From what you could tell before descending, the Rebellion had the upper hand.

You've tracked Weisss personal shuttle to an Imperial base on the surface below. Capturing him could lead to an early end to the battle and victory for the Rebellion, so you are told to take him alive if you can.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack a door (Health 5, Defense: 1 black die), or a hero can interact with a door ({I}) to open it.
{-} The mission will progress when the first door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

You keep Vader on the defensive, spreading out and never allowing him to isolate any one of you. Soon you begin to drive him back, coordinating your strikes with absolute precision.

Vader staggers under your assault, and you think you may even be able to defeat him. He ceases fighting and raises both arms, ignoring the fire you continue to pour upon him. The room trembles, and the walls buckle inward with a screech of protesting metal. You're thrown to the ground as the structure is ripped apart by his awesome power.

By the time you crawl free of the twisted wreck, there is no sign of Vader. As you depart in your transport, you see the wreckage of the Imperial fleet floating in space around you. Though you know that the war is far from over, your efforts have contributed toward a great victory for the Rebel Alliance.

{-} The Rebels win the campaign!

Vader is too powerful, and one by one you fall to his might.

Those who survived are taken prisoner. From what you hear; Rebel forces were defeated in the skies above while you struggled against the Dark Lord. You think it must be propaganda, but it is difficult to know far certain.

A large spectacle is made of your trial on Coruscant. Your activities in recent months are dragged out; its almost an honor to relive your exploits. In the end, you're charged with high treason, which carries a death sentence.

You 'll never know what your contribution provided to the Rebellion in your final days. Despite the Imperial propaganda, however, you truly believe that the victory was decisive,   that your part in it was important, and most of all that your sacrifice will be remembered.

{-} The Rebels lose the campaign.

The door slides open to reveal a dimly lit warehouse, a corridor leading deeper into the building. A pair of scarlet-robed guards and a floating droid guard the corridor, immediately turning towards you.

{-} The mission will progress when the second door opens.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door appears to lead into a warehouse.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack a door (Health 5, Defense: 1 black die), or a hero can interact with a door ({I}) to open it.

events.eventText:
The door opens into a huge hangar. Immediately, soldiers and officers rush forward.

"Defend the command center!", an officer shouts, who had just been performing maintenance on what looks like an Imperial torture droid.

{-} The mission will progress when a door to the Command Center opens.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The humming and whirring of machinery suggests that there is a huge hangar behind this door.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack a door (Health 5, Defense: 1 black die), or a hero can interact with a door ({I}) to open it.

{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack a door (Health 5, Defense: 1 black die), or a hero can interact with a door ({I}) to open it.
{-} The mission will progress when a door to the Command Center opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
The door opens to reveal Weiss, on his knees before Darth Vader; who looms over the General with an outstretched hand.

"Lord Vader; please!" General Weiss's hands grasp at the collar of his uniform, struggling to choke out his last few words. "Not a failure ... merely ... a ... setback .. . "

Before you can decide whether to try to save the General or flee in terror; Weiss crumples to the ground.

Vader slowly turns toward you, a grim silence in the room save for the soft hissing of his breathing apparatus. He appraises each of you before the blazing red of his lightsaber springs to life.

{-} Apply +8 to <color="red">Darth Vader</color>'s Health. Apply +1 {G} to each of his defense results.
{-} <color="red">Darth Vader</color> performs two activations each round, one after the other. (Follow the instruction list again from the top.)
{-} If <color="red">Darth Vader</color> would be defeated, he is not defeated until the end of his second activation.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Darth Vader</color> is defeated.
